channel.title: Someone help me, newcomer at mysql!
channel.description:
can someone point me in right direction for mysql etc tutorial for my server please?
i want to make it so there is auto donate, vote for cash, highscores linked with my site to my server, i have tried google, none of it looks relevant. i have no previous experience with mysql, i have a webhost but im starting from scratch
thank you :)
